title: UpdateProperties (Method)
text:
METHOD UpdateProperties : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Updates the object initialization data with the persistent data (if present).

rows.Name: devInstance
rows.Comment:
The device instance for which objects the update should be
done.

rows: The object identifier for which the update should be done.

rows.Name: propList
rows.Comment:
The pointer to the array with the property declarations for the
object initialization.

rows: The number of entries in the array with properties.

rows.Name: pBuffer
rows.Comment:
This pointer is used to store the allocated buffer pointer which
contains the loaded data which are needed for object construction.
The application has to free this buffer after object construction.
